product_name: Patagonia  Ultralight Down Hoody Jacket - Men's
long_description: On alpine ascents when both weight and warmth are critical, the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody is essential. Its premium 800-fill-power goose down delivers superb warmth at a mere 9 oz.
short_description: On alpine ascents when both weight and warmth are critical, the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody is essential. Its premium 800-fill-power goose down delivers superb warmth at a mere 9 oz.
